Ghost disciple
Released15 February 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceGhost
LocationPort Phasmatys
QuestGhosts Ahoy
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineA ghost disciple.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID2988

Ghost disciples are followers of Necrovarus. They worship Ectofuntus in Port Phasmatys. Players need a ghostspeak amulet while talking to Ghost disciples, otherwise they will only say "wooo woooo wooooo woo".

The ghost disciples, like most ghosts living in Port Phasmatys, have a green glow to them. After worshipping the Ectofuntus, players can talk to the disciples to receive ectotokens. The maximum tokens they can hold before forcing players to collect them is 1,000.

6 – 13 November 2006

The NPC was renamed from "Ghost Disciple" to "Ghost disciple".

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Prior to an update on 13 July 2017, ghost disciples would only hold 65 tokens before the player is forced to collect them.
